title: Rengar, Nocturne, Kha'zix, or Ekko?
body:
Yeah, I'm thinking of which one to save up for. Or another champion. I'm a jungle main and I usually play lee sin but I want to try something new. So rengar, nocturne, kha'zix, or ekko or any other champion? 
Usually I prefer the one that deals the most damage. 
Thanks!

replies.body: Or you can just wait for next season and see what's meta
When i used to play i always had a blast playing ekko.
Not the greatest in the list. But definately the most fun for me personally.
Does hecarim have high dmaage potential?

> [{quoted}](name=Epixragequit,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=dGXpy7Pz,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-20T18:17:19.571+0000)
>
> Does hecarim have high dmaage potential?

Oh hell yes.
Even higher than nocturne, rengar etc?

"Usually I prefer the one that deals the most damage."

Evelynn.
/t
